description.en:
ME+FLEX
MEFLEX is a platform that aims to provide everything for the MZ generation, who does not spare an investment in themselves and that SNS is also becoming a daily routine.
MEF Token begins with close communication with celebrities, such as accurately identifying consumer needs and establishing relationships with smart consumption.
We want to identify and provide what the MZ generation wants most.
In all of our services, MEF Token plays a key role as a key currency and leads to smart consumption by consumers.
